Yes, gauntlet was one of our favorite games, way back .. er, too many years 
ago to count :) It had a strong part in forming what we wanted to do for 
Gladiator.

For the maps and levels .. so far, a nice fellow named Chris has been 
working on taking what we have, and turning it into a master list .. let's 
see .. he should be on the list; also, his e-mail address is: 
shayd@...  in case you want to ask him directly :)

And yes -- I really should have an updated page listing user levels .. I'll 
try to get around to it eventually, honest! ;->

--Tom
